name: Waidmann - A Hunting Game
description:
Waidmann (old german word for hunter) is an arcade hunting game. Take on the role of a hunter and hunt different animals in varied hunting grounds. Improve your equipment over time and unlock new hunting grounds.

FEATURES
  • a wide hunting ground based on mountain/hill enviroment
  • animal ai for deers and ibaxs with a herd system
  • different rifles
  • simple weather system
FEATURES TO COME
  • animals like bears, wolfes and more!
  • improved ai with custom behaviour for the different animal species
  • multiple weapons and gadgets
  • ammunition system
  • more hunting grounds with own animal species
  • questsystem
